titles.title: Tobacco Price Support Elimination Act of 1993
A bill to eliminate the price support and production adjustment programs for tobacco, and for other purposes.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S10576)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Agriculture.
Referred to Subcommittee on Agricultural Production.

committee.name: Senate Agriculture, Nutrition, and Forestry
committee.subcommittee: Agricultural Production and Stabilization of Prices

bill.summary: 8/5/1993--Introduced. Tobacco Price Support Elimination Act of 1993 - Amends specified agricultural Acts to eliminate price supports and other production and marketing assistance for tobacco.
